label: 不朽之战 War of Immortals

Remove a Condition.description:
画风 1神话点

效果 该生物结束一项正在影响它的状态。
Remove a Condition.name: 移除状态 Remove a Condition

Hazard Immunity.name: 危害免疫 Hazard Immunity
Hazard Immunity.description: 一个神话伏兵在自己的巢穴中永远不会触发危害反应，并且免疫巢穴中危害造成的破坏性区域效果的负面影响。

Mythic Resilience (Reflex and Will).name: 神话复原 Mythic Resilience (反射和意志)
Mythic Resilience (Reflex and Will).description: 该怪物将与其相关的豁免成功率比骰掷结果的成功度高一个等级。这不会与其他改变成功度的效果叠加，例如失能特征（自然1或20时除外）。怪物每次获得神话复原时，可选择一项豁免。该能力应首先应用于该怪物的最高豁免。

Skittering Reposition.name: 跳跃换位 Skittering Reposition
Skittering Reposition.description:
触发 一个生物从高基特斯的触及范围外移动到它的触及范围内

效果 高基特斯移动10尺。这不会触发反应动作。

Carry Off Prey.name: 衔走猎物 Carry Off Prey
Carry Off Prey.description: 高基特斯在有生物@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]于其颚中时，能以全额速度带着该生物一起移动。

Mythic Power.name: 神话之力 Mythic Power
Mythic Power.description: 该生物拥有 3 点神话点，并可以将这些神话点用于以下任何动作。

Mythic Skill.name: 神话技能 Mythic Skill
Mythic Skill.description:
花费 1神话点

效果 神话高基特斯在下一次运动或隐秘技能检定时会获得+4加值，并在该检定中被视为拥有神话熟练度。此能力应用于获得此能力时的一项技能，如果生物的等级达到12级或更高，则应用于第二项技能。

Skittering Assault.name: 跳跃突袭 Skittering Assault
Skittering Assault.description: 高基特斯行走三次。在每次行走期间，它都能在过程中的任何一点对触及范围内的一个生物进行一次腿打击；每次攻击必须针对不同的生物，直到所有打击都结束之后，多重攻击减值才生效。如果在跳跃突袭过程中有任何一次打击大失败，则跳跃突袭中止。

Mythic Gogiteth.name: 神话高基特斯 Mythic Gogiteth
Mythic Gogiteth.publicNotes:
高基特斯是恐怖的梦魇，它有着蜘蛛般的腿、尖锐的牙齿和无穷的眼睛。在格拉利昂的所有生物中，高基特斯可以说是最骇人听闻的生物之一，在它获得神话力量之后，将成为其他人的噩梦。

通常情况下，高基特斯的受害者至少还能听到它在黑暗中爬行时发出的可怕的噼啪声和关节爆裂声，从而有机会逃离这个正在寻找他们的贪婪噩梦。然而，神话伏击高基特斯却一反常态地保持沉默。当生物被这种怪物追杀时，可能听到的第一个声音就是当高基特斯的下颚咬住它们时，它们自己短暂呼吸发出的急促喘息声，或者是当它的一条腿刺穿它们时，它们的肉体和衣服被撕裂的声音。

尽管人们对高基特斯的起源知之甚少，但神话高基特斯通常会像其他生物一样获得神话之力。格拉利昂不乏卑鄙的神祇，他们可能会残忍地把一丝神话之力赐予像高基特斯这样可怕的生物。它们的母巢位于幽暗地域，因此不太可能受到神雨的影响，但古拉姆溢出的血滴通过裂缝渗入这些梦魇般怪物饥渴的下颚也并非不可能。

Primal Chaos Aura.name: Primal Chaos Aura

Wild Surge.description:
Trigger A character casts a primal spell within the hazard's area

Effect Each living creature in the area gains [[/r 2d4 #Temporary Hit Points]] temporary Hit Points that last for 1 minute as life energy wells up around them, and the hazard rolls initiative.
Wild Surge.name: Wild Surge

Primal Chaos Aura.disable: @Check[nature|dc:22|name:Draw Off Excess Power] to negate the aura's effect for 1 round by temporarily drawing off the excess power and channeling it back into surrounding terrain, @Check[nature|dc:26|name:Disperse Lingering Magic] (expert) to completely disperse the lingering magic
Primal Chaos Aura.hazarddescription: Primal magic becomes unpredictable near areas where Agyra lairs, sometimes to hazardous effect.
Primal Chaos Aura.stealthdetails: or @Check[perception|dc:26|traits:action:seek] to feel a tingle in the air and smell a rich, chlorophyll-green fragrance with no discernible source
Primal Chaos Aura.routine: (2 actions) On its initiative, the hazard gathers primal energy from the surroundings as its first action. Roll [[/gmr 1d6 #Energy Gathered]] to determine the type of energy gathered. The hazard uses its second action to replicate the associated spell (2nd rank, DC 23, spell attack modifier [[/r 1d20+15 #Spell Attack]]{+15}). The spell's target or targets are chosen randomly from creatures in the area. Any spell cast by this hazard is primal. 1 air (@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.g8QqHpv2CWDwmIm1]{Gust of Wind}); 2 electricity (@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.zDJS8E66UI0himqV]{Thunderstrike}); 3 fire (@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.ZxHC7V7HtjUsB8zH]{Blazing Bolt}); 4 poison (@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.DYdvMZ8G2LiSLVWw]{Spider Sting}); 5 sonic (@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.1xbFBQDRs0hT5xZ9]{Shatter}); 6 water (@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.jfVCuOpzC6mUrf6f]{Hydraulic Push})
Primal Chaos Aura.reset: The hazard deactivates and immediately resets if it has no targets for 1 round; it also resets if Agyra slumbers for 1 week within 100 feet.

Mythic Ogre Boss.name: 神话食人魔老大 Mythic Ogre Boss

Titanic Might.name: 泰坦之威 Titanic Might
Titanic Might.description: 神话蛮战在执行@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.PMbdMWc2QroouFGD]或@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]等动作时，能忽略体型的限制。

Mythic Ferocity.name: 神话凶猛 Mythic Ferocity
Mythic Ferocity.description:
花费 1神话点

触发 怪物的HP降为0；

效果 怪物避免被击倒并保持其最大HP值的一半，但其受伤值会增加1。当它@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Yl48xTdMh3aeQYL2]{受伤 Wounded 3}时，它将无法再使用此能力。

Bellowing Command.description: 食人魔老大发出命令并催促手下。每名听到并理解命令的食人魔盟友获得@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]状态，持续至该盟友的下个回合结束为止，不过它只能使用额外动作来快步或行走。
Bellowing Command.name: 吼叫下令 Bellowing Command

Mythic Power.name: 神话之力 Mythic Power
Mythic Power.description: 该生物拥有 3 点神话点，并可以将这些神话点用于以下任何动作。

Mythic Skill.name: 神话技能 Mythic Skill
Mythic Skill.description:
花费 1神话点

效果 神话食人魔老大在下一次技能检定时会获得+4加值，并在该检定中被视为拥有神话熟练度。此能力应用于获得此能力时的一项技能，如果生物的等级达到12级或更高，则应用于第二项技能。

Sweeping Hook.name: 挥舞肉钩 Sweeping Hook
Sweeping Hook.description:
触发 食人魔老大使用食人魔肉钩成功@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]了1个生物

效果 食人魔老大对它摔绊的生物作出1次食人魔肉钩打击。

Mythic Ogre Boss.publicNotes: 对于食人魔来说，最巨硕、最强壮、最残暴的食人魔才有权领导他们。当这种生物获得神话之力时，它的残忍可能只有与之相匹配的巨大耐久力。神话食人魔老大甚至能用食人魔肉钩捕杀像巨型恐龙这样强大而巨大的猎物，用难以置信的力量将它们拖倒并撕成碎片。如果一群神话食人魔老大联合起来，它们将成为一个可怕的威胁，可以轻而易举地征服村庄乃至一座小城市。幸运的是，它们崇尚暴力和力量至上的理念，这意味着每当这些生物接触时，它们更有可能立即互相开战，以证明谁才是强者。

Mythic Immunity.name: 神话免疫 Mythic Immunity
Mythic Immunity.description: 赞德雷巨象免疫非神话生物所施放的伤害法术，使用非神话武器进行的打击，及非神话角色的无武装打击。

Mythic Resilience.name: 神话韧性 Mythic Resilience
Mythic Resilience.description: 巨象会将其所有豁免视为比实际结果好一档（因此大失败为失败，失败为成功，成功为大成功）。每轮某个角色第一次对巨象掷出重击时，必须重掷攻击掷骰并接受新的结果。

Reactive.name: 敏锐反应 Reactive
Reactive.description: 赞德雷巨象每轮获得3个反应动作。它对每次触发仍然只能使用一个反应动作。

Undying Myth.name: 不灭神话 Undying Myth
Undying Myth.description:
花费 生物全部神话点

触发 生物将要死亡，并且至少拥有1神话点

效果 当赞德雷巨象将要死亡时，只要它至少拥有1神话点，它就会立即消耗它所拥有的所有剩余神话点，保持站立和清醒，并恢复其最大生命值的50%。

Brutal Drag.name: 蛮力拖拽 Brutal Drag
Brutal Drag.description: 当巨象使用行走动作时，任何@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]于赞德雷巨象象牙的生物都会随之移动到巨象结束位置20尺范围内的位置。它们会一直维持受擒，并由GM决定它们最终会移动到哪个方格。

Destructive Frenzy.name: 破坏狂暴 Destructive Frenzy
Destructive Frenzy.description: 赞德雷巨象以任意顺序进行两次象牙打击，两次脚打击，和一次象鼻打击。

Devastating Launch.name: 毁灭发射 Devastating Launch
Devastating Launch.description:
花费 1神话点

效果 赞德雷巨象将它的象牙插入地面，以它20尺内一点为中心的@Template[type:burst|distance:15]范围，收集该区域内的所有事物，包括当前@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]于其象牙攻击的任何生物，并将它们全部抛出120尺远。所有东西都会落在@Template[type:burst|distance:30]范围内，对区域内的每个生物造成@Damage[12d6[bludgeoning]]伤害（@Check[reflex|dc:51|basic]豁免）。该伤害也适用于被巨象抛出的任何生物、载具或物体。被抛掷区域内的生物如果反射豁免成功或大成功，则会停留在开始所处的方格内。巨象抛出的任何物体都会落在一个方格内，具体位置由GM决定。

Trample.description:
超大型或更小体型，脚踩，@Check[reflex|dc46:|basic]

当赞德雷巨象使用践踏时，它能够行走至多三倍速度的距离，任何反射豁免失败或大失败的生物将被击至@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]。

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.Trample]
Trample.name: 践踏 Trample

Trumpeting Blast.name: 吼叫音爆 Trumpeting Blast
Trumpeting Blast.description:
赞德雷巨象会从它的象鼻中向@Template[type:cone|distance:120]范围内发出尖锐的音爆。区域内的每个生物都必须尝试一次@Check[fortitude|dc:49]豁免。如果巨象在行动中消耗了1点神话点，DC会变成51，伤害骰也会增加到d12。赞德雷的巨象在[[/gmr 1d4 #Recharge Trumpeting Blast]]{1d4轮}内无法再次使用吼叫音爆。

大成功 生物不受影响。

成功 生物受到@Damage[7d10[sonic]]伤害，并陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]1轮。

失败 生物受到@Damage[14d10[sonic]]伤害，并陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1}，持续2轮，以及耳聋2轮。

大失败 生物受到@Damage[28d10[sonic]]伤害，并陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 2}，持续2轮，以及耳聋4轮。

Remove a Condition.name: 移除状态 Remove a Condition
Remove a Condition.description:
花费 1神话点

效果 赞德雷巨象移除任意一个正在影响他的状态。

Legendary Vigor.name: 传奇活力 Legendary Vigor
Legendary Vigor.description: 赞德雷巨象免疫速度减值，并且它忽略困难地形和高等困难地形。

Mythic Power.name: 神话之力 Mythic Power
Mythic Power.description: 该生物拥有 3 点神话点，并可以将这些神话点用于以下任何动作。

Oliphaunt of Jandelay.name: 赞德雷巨象 Oliphaunt of Jandelay
Oliphaunt of Jandelay.publicNotes:
湮灭的先兆 Harbinger of Annihilation

赞德雷巨象会被吸引到正急速驶向毁灭的世界。

Vulot.name: 沃洛特 Vulot
Vulot.publicNotes:
万全亦乌有 The All or None

沃洛特是谎言、丧失身份和窒息的新生恶魔领主。如果它的一个形态被摧毁，一天后它就能以众多被盗身份中的一个重新化身。

Absolute Surety.name: 绝对保证 Absolute Surety
Absolute Surety.description: 沃洛特依靠欺骗和魅惑来实现自己的目标。如果沃洛特未能欺骗他人，例如未能通过与假像术相关的欺骗检定使观察者相信某个来自复制体的动作，沃洛特就会受到@Damage[4d6[mental]]伤害。这种伤害忽视沃洛特通常的免疫能力。

Many Eyes in Many Places.name: 众处之众眼 Many Eyes in Many Places
Many Eyes in Many Places.description: 只要邪教徒处于物质宇宙或外层裂隙中，沃洛特就能通过任何一个穿戴着他被盗身份的邪教徒延伸他的感官。沃洛特无法同时通过三个以上的邪教徒保持注意力。沃洛特无法通过这些邪教徒说话。

Recharge Spell.name: 再充能 Recharge Spell
Recharge Spell.description:
花费 1神话点

沃洛特获得额外一次其任意内在法术的使用次数。

Remove a Condition.name: 移除状态 Remove a Condition
Remove a Condition.description:
花费 1神话点

效果 沃洛特移除任意一个正在影响他的状态。

Another Face.name: 其他面孔 Another Face
Another Face.description: 当沃洛特的生命值降至0时，他会在24小时内从自己选择的被盗身份中自我再生。如果沃洛特没有剩余的被盗身份，或因其他原因无法接触到被盗身份，他就会被永久杀死。

Mythic Power.name: 神话之力 Mythic Power
Mythic Power.description: 该生物拥有 3 点神话点，并可以将这些神话点用于任何神话动作。

Mythic Immunity.description: 沃洛特免疫非神话生物所施放的伤害法术，使用非神话武器进行的打击，及非神话角色的无武装打击。
Mythic Immunity.name: 神话免疫 Mythic Immunity

Perfect Mimicry.name: 完美模仿 Perfect Mimicry
Perfect Mimicry.description:
触发 一个法术在沃洛特60尺内被施放

效果 沃洛特复制该法术，并可以在接下来的24小时内消耗一个神话点施放它一次。沃洛特不能同时持有超过两个复制咒语。

Suffocated by a Thousand Breaths.name: 千息扼制 Suffocated by a Thousand Breaths
Suffocated by a Thousand Breaths.description:
30尺。沃洛特的窃取呼吸影响会从他的身体向外辐射，使受害者感到窒息。任何在灵光内开始回合的生物都必须尝试 一次@Check[fortitude|dc:41]豁免。

大成功 生物不受影响。

成功 生物呼吸变得急促，陷入措手不及直到其下个回合开始。

失败 生物难以喘息。它不能说话或使用听觉动作直到其下个回合开始；这会阻止它施放不具有晦匿特征的法术。

大失败 所有的空气都会立刻离开生物的肺部，它开始窒息。当它在回合结束时成功通过豁免来从失去意识中恢复时，它会陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]状态直到其休息一整夜。

Steal Face.name: 窃取面容 Steal Face
Steal Face.description:
花费 1神话点

效果 沃洛特进行一次爪打击。如果命中，沃洛特会尝试一次@Check[deception|against:will]检定对抗目标的意志DC，以窃取该生物的面容；如果重击，沃洛特会将其欺骗检定结果视为高一级的成功度。成功时，沃洛特偷走目标的面容，持续[[/gmr 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮}（大成功时为1分钟）；被偷走面容的生物不会被任何生物视为盟友。

Steal Thoughts.name: 窃取思维 Steal Thoughts
Steal Thoughts.description:
沃洛特的心灵攻击可以造成困惑和迷惘。被沃洛特的思维尖刺命中的生物必须尝试一次@Check[will|dc:44]豁免。因此效果陷入呆滞的生物对沃洛特的窃取面容能力处于措手不及状态。

大成功 生物不受影响。

成功 生物陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 1}，持续1轮。

失败 生物陷入呆滞1，持续1分钟。如果它已经处于呆滞状态，则改为其呆滞状态值增加1（最大到@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 4}）。

大失败 同失败，外加目标陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]，持续1分钟。

Recklessly Overconfident.name: Recklessly Overconfident
Recklessly Overconfident.description: The Immortal Trickster knows he is immortal and takes risks that cause his failures to be particularly spectacular. Whenever the Immortal Trickster would fail at a Deception, Stealth, or Thievery check, he critically fails instead.

Immortal Tricks.description: When the Immortal Trickster is reduced to 0 Hit Points, he returns to life at full health and with all his powers and Mythic Points recharged after 24 hours. He usually, but not always, returns at the site of his death, though he can appear anywhere on the same world where there are coyotes, foxes, or ravens.
Immortal Tricks.name: Immortal Tricks

Mythic Resistance.name: Mythic Resistance
Mythic Resistance.description: The Immortal Trickster has resistance 11 to all damage from attacks and spells from non-mythic creatures.

Confounding Theft.description:
Cost 1 Mythic Point

Effect The Immortal Trickster makes a Thievery check against the Perception DC of one creature he can see within 60 feet. On a success, the Trickster gains possession of any one item he chooses of up to 2 Bulk that the target is currently holding, wearing, wielding, or has stowed on their person. This must be a single item and does not include full sets of clothing like worn armor or garments.
Confounding Theft.name: Confounding Theft

Cunning Escape.name: Cunning Escape
Cunning Escape.description:
Frequency once per day

Effect The Immortal Trickster trades places with one of his sensory animals (see trickster's network, above). The animal appears in the square the Trickster is currently occupying and the Trickster teleports to the animal's original location with all of his possessions. If a creature has witnessed the Trickster's Change Shape, they must succeed at a @Check[perception|dc:38] check to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.1xRFPTFtWtGJ9ELw]{Sense Motive} or be fooled into thinking that the Trickster has simply changed shape into an animal instead of teleported.

Mythic Power.name: Mythic Power
Mythic Power.description: The creature has a pool of 3 Mythic Points, and can spend those Mythic Points for any of the actions it has.

Mythic Skill.name: Mythic Skill
Mythic Skill.description:
Cost 1 Mythic Point

Effect The Immortal Trickster can spend a Mythic Point whenever he makes a check using Deception or Thievery to make the check at mythic proficiency.

Recharge Spell.name: Recharge Spell
Recharge Spell.description:
Cost 1 Mythic Point

Effect The Immortal Trickster gains an additional casting of any of his innate primal spells that he has already cast.

Remove a Condition.name: Remove a Condition
Remove a Condition.description:
Cost 1 Mythic Point

Effect The creature ends one condition affecting it.

Trickster's Network.name: Trickster's Network
Trickster's Network.description: The Immortal Trickster can extend his senses through any coyote, fox, or raven in the Universe, making it his sensory animal. He cannot maintain his attention through more than three sensory animals at one time. He can speak through his sensory animals, but only in a single short phrase per animal of no more than two words. He has little control over his sensory animals' actions, though they usually act in a way that is consistent with his desires unless they have a specific reason not to. When extending his senses through a sensory animal, he can use that animal to determine line of effect for any of his spells or abilities.

Bond with Mortals.name: Bond with Mortals
Bond with Mortals.description:
Frequency once per day

Effect The Immortal Trickster forms a bond with a mortal creature. While the bond exists, the mortals bonded to the Immortal Trickster increase their current and maximum Hit Points by 10 and gain a +2 status bonus to their attack and damage rolls, as well as to skill checks they make using Deception, Stealth, or Thievery. The Immortal Trickster can communicate telepathically with any of his bonded mortals as long as both beings are on the same plane. Each week that they are bonded to the Trickster, the bonded mortals increase their doomed value by 1; their doomed value cannot be increased above 3 by this ability and their doomed value cannot decrease while they remain bonded to the Trickster. The Immortal Trickster can be bonded with up to six mortals at a time, and they can take this action again to end the bond or to form a new bond. The bond also ends if the mortal dies. Whenever one of his bonded mortals dies, the Immortal Trickster becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 1} or increases the value of his drained condition by 1, and the Trickster gains a +2 status bonus on the next attack roll or skill check he attempts.

Change Shape.name: Change Shape
Change Shape.description: The Immortal Trickster takes on the appearance of a coyote, fox, or raven. In areas where another Tiny or Small animal is known for wiliness and trickery, the Immortal Trickster can assume that animal's shape instead. While transformed, the Immortal Trickster loses his innate spells, attacks, and special actions, but doesn't otherwise change his statistics and can still speak. In fox or coyote form, the Immortal Trickster's size changes to Tiny (for a fox) or Small (for a coyote), his Speed increases to 35 feet, and he gains a bite (+23 to hit for @Damage[(2d6+4)[piercing]] damage). In raven form, he is Tiny, gains a fly Speed of 25 feet, and gains a beak (agile, +23 to-hit for @Damage[(2d4+4)[piercing]] damage).

Immortal Trickster.name: Immortal Trickster
Immortal Trickster.publicNotes:
The Immortal Trickster

The Immortal Trickster is an immortal spirit guide who always returns to life no matter how he's killed. After his death, he often recorporates in the same area, though if his body is destroyed in its entirety, he sometimes awakens in an entirely different continent.

Sublime Breath.publicNotes:
Bringers of Inspiration

A sublime breath seeks to perfect their craft, or, when they see the seed of potential in a worthy mortal, to inspire them to new heights.
Sublime Breath.allSaves: +2 status to all saves vs. emotion; mythic resilience (Will)

Thought Slips Away.description: The sublime breath's ephemeral lightness makes them impossible to grasp. They use their Performance modifier to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escape}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.21WIfSu7Xd7uKqV8]{Tumble Through}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.2HJ4yuEFY1Cast4h]{High Jump}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.JUvAvruz7yRQXfz2]{Long Jump}. When they @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.d5I6018Mci2SWokk]{Leap}, High Jump, or Long Jump, the movement does not provoke reactions.
Thought Slips Away.name: Thought Slips Away

+2 Status to All Saves vs. Emotion.name: +2 Status to All Saves vs. Emotion

Change Shape.description:
The sublime breath can take on the appearance of any Medium or Large humanoid creature. This doesn't change their Speed or their attack and damage bonuses with their Strikes, but might change the damage type their Strikes deal.

The sublime breath instinctively takes on the appearance an observer finds most inspiring. The first time they become observed, they use Change Shape as a free action, even if they were unaware they were being observed, they take on a specific appearance reflecting the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden} desires, hopes, artistic inclinations, or similar deep-seated emotions of a single observer. As long as the sublime breath can be observed by this creature and maintains this shape, the observer gains a +1 circumstance bonus to Crafting and Performance checks and takes a –1 circumstance penalty to Will saves against the sublime breath or to any check or DC that would attempt to capture or restrain them, such as attempts to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.PMbdMWc2QroouFGD]{Grapple} or the DC of a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.DCQHaLrYXMI37dvW]{Paralyze} spell.
Change Shape.name: Change Shape

Hours Go By.name: Hours Go By
Hours Go By.description: A sublime breath's presence can allow artists and artisans to work almost effortlessly in a state of perfect flow. The sublime breath encourages a single creature within 60 feet, who becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{Quickened}. They can spend the extra action only to Sustain a spell or other ability.

Mythic Power.name: Mythic Power
Mythic Power.description: The creature has a pool of 3 Mythic Points, and can spend those Mythic Points for any of the actions it has.

Artistic Specialist.name: Artistic Specialist
Artistic Specialist.description: In a recital, competition, or other measure of artistic skill, a sublime breath is a 12th-level challenge.

Immaculate Instrument.name: Immaculate Instrument
Immaculate Instrument.description: A sublime breath carries a single tool, prop, or instrument related to its chosen craft, such as a mask, sash, or paintbrush. As long as they possess their immaculate instrument, they treat any critical failures on Crafting or Performance checks as failures.

Remove a Condition.name: Remove a Condition
Remove a Condition.description:
Cost 1 Mythic Point

Effect The sublime breath removes any one condition currently affecting them.

Mythic Resilience.name: Mythic Resilience
Mythic Resilience.description: The sublime breath treats their Will saving throws as one step better than it actually is (so a critical failure is a failure, a failure is a success, and a success is a critical success).

Artistic Creation.name: Artistic Creation
Artistic Creation.description:
Frequency once per round

Effect The sublime breath's art is so real that it takes shape in the hearts of those who witness it. The sublime breath crafts, acts, recites a tale or song, or otherwise uses their art to create a work of art in a @Template[type:burst|distance:10] within 60 feet. The creation is perceptible and tangible to creatures that don't disbelieve it and it affects them accordingly; for instance a ladder could be climbed, and a campfire would provide heat and even be able to cook food for an affected creature. A hazardous creation deals @Damage[4d6[untyped]] damage to creatures that enter or begin their turn in the area (@Check[will|dc:24|basic] save), of a type matching the creation, usually a physical damage type or a common energy type such as fire, acid, or cold. The creation lasts until the end of the sublime breath's next turn, though the sublime breath can Sustain it to prolong the effect for up to 1 minute. The sublime breath can Sustain any number of Artistic Creations with a single action.

Artistic Destruction.name: Artistic Destruction
Artistic Destruction.description:
Requirements The sublime breath has either used Artistic Creation this turn or Sustained an Artistic Creation this turn

Effect The sublime breath destroys their creations to make way for new growth. All of their currently sustained Artistic Creations detonate, dealing @Damage[8d6[untyped]] damage to all enemy creatures either within a creation or within a @Template[type:burst|distance:10] of it (@Check[will|dc:24|basic] save). The damage type matches the creation. Creatures in multiple overlapping bursts take damage only once, of the type of their choice. The sublime breath then cannot use Artistic Creation for [[/gmr 1d4]] turns.

Sublime Breath.name: Sublime Breath

Adopted Brood.name: Adopted Brood
Adopted Brood.description:
Trigger A creature deals precision damage to the Weaver

Effect A spray of smaller spiders pours out of the open wound. These spiders deal @Damage[3d6[piercing]] damage to a single creature within 15 feet of the Weaver and expose that creature to Weaver venom before skittering away.

Countless Eyes.name: Countless Eyes
Countless Eyes.description: The Weaver of Webs can see through the eyes of any spider, living or dead, in one of her many lairs. When the Weaver casts her @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.r784cIz17eWujtQj]{Scrying} spell and targets a spider in her lair, the spell is not expended, and the spider automatically critically fails its saving throw.

Greater Web Sense.name: Greater Web Sense
Greater Web Sense.description: The Weaver of Webs' tremorsense also extends to any of her webs, regardless of distance or area, and her tremorsense is a precise sense against any creature in contact with one of her webs.

Remove a Condition.name: Remove a Condition
Remove a Condition.description:
Cost 1 Mythic Point

Effect The Weaver removes any one condition currently affecting her.

+1 Status to All Saves vs. Magic.name: +1 Status to All Saves vs. Magic

Webbed Conveyance.name: Webbed Conveyance
Webbed Conveyance.description:
Requirements The Weaver is within 15 feet of a creature @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Paralyzed} in her nightmare cocoon

Effect The Weaver grabs the paralyzed target, webs them to her back or one of her legs, and then Strides. As long as the creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} by the Weaver's nightmare cocoon, it shares the Weaver's space and moves with her. The DC to [[/act escape dc=36]]{Escape} the nightmare cocoon increases to 36.

Mythic Resistance.name: Mythic Resistance
Mythic Resistance.description: The Weaver of Webs has resistance 15 to all attacks made with non-mythic weapons and unarmed attacks made by nonmythic creatures.

Mythic Power.name: Mythic Power
Mythic Power.description: The creature has a pool of 3 Mythic Points, and can spend those Mythic Points for any of the actions it has.

Nightmare Cocoon.name: Nightmare Cocoon
Nightmare Cocoon.description: A creature struck by the Weaver's web Strike must succeed at a @Check[reflex|dc:34] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} ([[/act escape dc=34]]). If the Weaver spends 1 Mythic Point as a free action when a creature fails this save, the creature is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Paralyzed}, experiencing terrible nightmares of their deepest-held anxieties. The Weaver can view these dreams using a Sustain action, which imparts a –2 circumstance penalty to any Will saves the target attempts against the Weaver's spells until the beginning of the Weaver's next turn. At the end of a paralyzed victim's turn, they can attempt a @Check[will|dc:34] save to end the paralyzed condition (though they are still immobilized until they Escape).

Spilled Secrets.name: Spilled Secrets
Spilled Secrets.description:
Any creature that speaks within this aura must succeed at a @Check[will|dc:34] save or divulge some kind of secret instead of whatever speech they intended. Linguistic spells and effects gain the concentrate trait if they didn't have it already and are wasted if the creature fails this save.

On a critical failure, the character betrays a secret they least want to reveal to the Weaver or those present.

Weaver Venom.name: Weaver Venom
Weaver Venom.description:
Saving Throw DC 34

Maximum Duration 6 rounds

Stage 1 2d10 poison (1 round)

Stage 2 2d10 poison and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} (2 rounds)

Stage 3 3d10 poison and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 2} (1 round)

Stage 4 4d10 poison (1 round) and the target permanently forgets the Weaver exists, including any previous mention of her.

Weaver of Webs.name: Weaver of Webs
Weaver of Webs.publicNotes:
Herald of the Web

Once a servitor of an ancient god of secrets, the Weaver of Webs now seeks to attain her own godhood.
Weaver of Webs.allSaves: +1 status to all saves vs. magic

Mythic Power.name: Mythic Power
Mythic Power.description: The creature has a pool of 3 Mythic Points, and can spend those Mythic Points for any of the actions it has.

Symphony of Pain.name: Symphony of Pain
Symphony of Pain.description:
Trigger A creature within Verex-That-Was's frightful presence damages Verex-That-Was

Effect Verex unleashes an echo of psychic pain throughout his vicinity, inflicting mental damage equal to half of the damage he sustained on all creatures, friend or foe, within 150 feet (@Check[fortitude|dc:45|basic] save).

Mythic Immunity.name: Mythic Immunity
Mythic Immunity.description: Verex-That-Was is immune to harmful spells cast by non-mythic creatures, Strikes made with non-mythic weapons, and unarmed Strikes from non-mythic characters.

Mythic Resilience.name: Mythic Resilience
Mythic Resilience.description: Verex-That-Was treats his saving throws with the associated save as one step better than they actually are (so a critical failure is a failure, a failure is a success, and a success is a critical success).

Undying Myth.name: Undying Myth
Undying Myth.description:
Cost all the creature's Mythic Points

Trigger Verex-That-Was would die and has at least 1 Mythic Point

Effect Verex remains standing and conscious, and recovers 50% of his maximum Hit Points.

Battlefield Eruption.name: Battlefield Eruption
Battlefield Eruption.description:
Cost 1 Mythic Point

Effect Verex-That-Was burrows into the ground, reemerging anywhere on the same plane where either he or his worshippers have previously killed at least 10 sapient creatures in battle. A fountain of gore and shattered bone erupts from the ground when Verex arrives, dealing @Damage[16d10[piercing]|options:area-damage] damage in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:30] (@Check[reflex|dc:48|basic|options:area-effect] save).

Bloodboils.name: Bloodboils
Bloodboils.description: Wounds caused by direct contact with Verex-That-Was erupt into painful, blood-filled boils. A creature struck by Verex-That-Was's jaws or tail must succeed at a @Check[fortitude|dc:45] or gain weakness 10 to physical damage for 1 day as the boils explode messily each time the creature sustains another wound. The bloodboils can be counteracted with a 3rd-rank (or higher) @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.SUKaxVZW2TlM8lu0]{Cleanse Affliction} spell, but the disease also ends if the victim receives magical healing that brings them to their Hit Point maximum.

Leap into the Fray.name: Leap into the Fray
Leap into the Fray.description: Verex-That-Was Leaps up to 20 feet horizontally and up to 10 feet vertically and then makes one claw Strike, one jaws Strike, and one tail Strike in any order. If Verex-That-Was spends 1 Mythic Point as part of this action, he doubles the distances he can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.d5I6018Mci2SWokk]{Leap} and each creature he lands adjacent to is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} until the end of his turn.

Verex-That-Was.name: Verex-That-Was
Verex-That-Was.publicNotes:
A Bloody Spawn of Rovagug

Once an orc god, Verex-That-Was has been reshaped into a towering creature of mangled flesh and bone.

Trump of the Oliphaunt.name: Trump of the Oliphaunt
Trump of the Oliphaunt.disable: @Check[arcana|dc:38|name:Shore Up the Area] (expert), @Check[maelstrom-lore|dc:38|name:Shore Up the Area] (expert), @Check[occultism|dc:38|name:Shore Up the Area] (master), @Check[religion|dc:38|name:Shore Up the Area] (master) to recognize and shore up the area against the localized planar instability causing a connection to the Oliphaunt of Jandelay. Four successes are needed to strengthen the area enough against the instability to end the hazard.
Trump of the Oliphaunt.reset: The area becomes unstable again after 24 hours.
Trump of the Oliphaunt.stealthdetails: (master) to notice the tension of a low vibration forming in the area from the imminent release of the Oliphaunt's trumpet
Trump of the Oliphaunt.hazarddescription: An overwhelming trumpeting sound vibrates and suffuses the area, causing everything to slow.
Trump of the Oliphaunt.routine:
(1 action) Each creature in the area must attempt a @Check[fortitude|dc:36] save. A creature with the slowed condition from this hazard takes a –2 circumstance penalty on further saves against this effect.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature takes @Damage[(2d6+6)[sonic]] damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]{Deafened} for 1 round.

Failure The creature takes @Damage[(4d6+13)[sonic]] damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} for 2 rounds.

Critical Failure The creature takes @Damage[(8d6+26)[sonic]] damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 2} for 2 rounds.

Bone-Shattering Rhythms.name: Bone-Shattering Rhythms
Bone-Shattering Rhythms.description:
Trigger Three or more characters enter the area of planar instability

Effect Pent-up magical energy from another world begins to release in waves of overwhelming sound. The hazard rolls initiative.

Counterspell.name: 法术反制 Counterspell
Counterspell.description:
触发 一个生物施放了一个巫妖准备了的法术。

效果 巫妖消耗一个已准备的法术来反制触发生物施放的相同法术。巫妖失去该法术位，如同施放了触发法术。巫妖随后尝试反制触发该反应的法术。

Recharge Spell.name: 再充能 Recharge Spell
Recharge Spell.description:
花费 1神话点

神话巫妖恢复一个法术。

Remove a Condition.name: 移除状态 Remove a Condition
Remove a Condition.description:
花费 1神话点

效果 神话巫妖结束一项正在影响它的状态。

Mythic Resilience (Reflex and Will).name: 神话复原 Mythic Resilience (反射和意志)
Mythic Resilience (Reflex and Will).description: 该怪物将与其相关的豁免成功率比骰掷结果的成功度高一个等级。这不会与其他改变成功度的效果叠加，例如失能特征（自然1或20时除外）。怪物每次获得神话复原时，可选择一项豁免。该能力应首先应用于该怪物的最高豁免。

Rejuvenation.name: 复生 Rejuvenation
Rejuvenation.description: 当巫妖被摧毁时，其灵魂会立即转移到@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.NEbr7nKuiluJgBHT]{命匣}内。只有先找到并摧毁巫妖的命匣，才能永久摧毁该命匣对应的巫妖。

+1 Status to All Saves vs. Vitality.name: 对抗命能时所有豁免+1状态加值

Steady Spellcasting.name: 稳定施法 Steady Spellcasting
Steady Spellcasting.description: 若一个反应动作将要打断巫妖的施法动作，巫妖尝试一次@Check[flat|dc:15]检定。成功时，该动作不会被打断。

Drain Soul Cage.name: 汲取命匣 Drain Soul Cage
Drain Soul Cage.description:
6环

频率 每天一次

效果 巫妖利用@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.qFVPeeJ70B1u2n81]的力量来施放任意最高到巫妖能施放的最高环级的法术，即便被施放的法术并非巫妖已准备的法术。巫妖使用该能力不需要其命匣在场。

Mythic Power.name: 神话之力 Mythic Power
Mythic Power.description: 该生物拥有 3 点神话点，并可以将这些神话点用于神话动作。

Siphon Life.name: 生命虹吸 Siphon Life
Siphon Life.description:
巫妖的存在形态会从其接触者身上吸取生命。当巫妖用无武装攻击伤害一个活物时，巫妖获得5临时生命值，且该生物必须成功通过一次@Check[fortitude|dc:34]豁免，否则将陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 1}。

如果巫妖在其回合开始时处于@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{受擒 Grabbed}或@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{束缚 Restrained}状态，每个擒获或束缚它的生物必须成功通过一次强韧豁免，否则将陷入流失1。如果巫妖再次虹吸该生物的生命，流失状态值将增加1，最高到@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 4}。

Mythic Lich.name: 神话巫妖 Mythic Lich
Mythic Lich.publicNotes: 神话巫妖可能是在转化之后接触到神话之力源泉的巫妖，或者是转化的目的就是为了向他们灌输神话之力。这种仪式可能需要使用神话神器作为命匣，杀死一位神话生物，或引诱神话生物对施法者发动致命一击。在默语魔道的信徒中，人们普遍认为默语暴君欺骗了奥罗登，让他以凡人的身份杀死自己，这样他就可以吸取奥罗登的部分力量来制造自己的命匣，让自己成为神话巫妖。
Mythic Lich.allSaves: 对抗命能时所有豁免+1状态加值；神话复原 (反射和意志)

Agyra.name: Agyra
Agyra.publicNotes:
The Forever Storm

Agyra is a massive kaiju who protects Spinescar Island and its inhabitants.

Remove a Condition.name: Remove a Condition
Remove a Condition.description:
Cost 1 Mythic Point

Effect Agyra removes any one condition currently affecting her.

Stormsight.name: Stormsight
Stormsight.description: Wind, precipitation, and clouds don't impair Agyra's vision; she ignores the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} condition from storms, mist, precipitation, and the like.

Blinding Flash.name: Blinding Flash
Blinding Flash.description:
Cost 1 Mythic Point

Effect By spreading her wings while she stands upon the ground, Agyra can create a blinding flash of light that targets all creatures within 100 feet. Affected creatures must succeed at a @Check[fortitude|dc:43] check.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 1} for [[/gmr 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds}.

Failure The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 2} for 1 minute.

Critical Failure The target is blinded and stupefied 2 for 10 minutes.

Mythic Resilience.description: Agyra treats her saving throws with Fortitude and Reflex saves as one step better than they actually are (so a critical failure is a failure, a failure is a success, and a success is a critical success). Whenever a character rolls a critical hit against Agyra, they must reroll the attack roll and take the new result.
Mythic Resilience.name: Mythic Resilience

Electrified Rebirth.name: Electrified Rebirth
Electrified Rebirth.description:
Frequency once per year

Effect When Agyra dies, her corpse crackles and sparks with electrical energy. Any creature that touches Agyra's body within 1 hour of her death takes @Damage[11d6[electricity]] damage (@Check[reflex|dc:43|basic] save). After being dead for 1 minute, Agyra is immediately resurrected in the same place, at full health, with all abilities fully restored. She normally takes advantage of this rebirth to flee to safety, using Thunderous Departure to retreat. If Agyra has already died and been reborn in the same year, she remains permanently dead upon being slain a second time.

Mythic Immunity.name: Mythic Immunity
Mythic Immunity.description:
Strikes

The creature is immune to either harmful spells cast by non-mythic creatures, or Strikes made with non-mythic weapons and unarmed Strikes from non-mythic characters. Only the most powerful creatures (typically level 25) should be immune to both.

Conjure Hurricane.name: Conjure Hurricane
Conjure Hurricane.description:
Frequency once per day

Cost 1 Mythic Point

Effect Agyra generates a hurricane that spreads across a 4-mile radius and lasts 24 hours, with a 500-foot calm eye of the storm at its center. Agyra is at the center of this hurricane when it is formed, but it moves normally (according to surrounding weather conditions and the GM's discretion) afterward.

Lightning Breath.name: Lightning Breath
Lightning Breath.description: Agyra exhales a line of electricity from each of her two heads. Each line is @Template[line|distance:120|width:10]{120 feet long and 10 feet wide}, and the two lines may be pointed in different directions. A creature in a line takes @Damage[22d6[electricity]|options:area-damage] damage (@Check[reflex|dc:44|basic|options:area-effect] save). On a failed save, the target is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} for [[/gmr 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds}. A creature can be affected only once by a line, even if they are in an overlapping area. A character slain by Agyra's Lightning Breath remains electrified for [[/gmr 2d4 #rounds]]{2d4 rounds} after death. A creature touching such a corpse takes @Damage[3d6[electricity]] damage (no save). Agyra can't use Lightning Breath for [[/gmr 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds}.

Recharge Ability.description:
Cost 1 Mythic Point

Effect Agyra gains an additional use of lightning breath.
Recharge Ability.name: Recharge Ability

Stormflight.name: Stormflight
Stormflight.description: Agyra can move in strong winds with ease. She doesn't treat wind as difficult terrain or need to Maneuver in Flight in high winds.

Mythic Power.name: Mythic Power
Mythic Power.description: The creature has a pool of 3 Mythic Points, and can spend those Mythic Points for any of the actions it has.

Thunderous Departure.name: Thunderous Departure
Thunderous Departure.description:
Frequency once per day

Effect Agyra Flies in a straight line at incredible speed, moving at least 120 feet but up to 1 mile. This movement doesn't provoke reactions. Her departure leaves behind a thunderous sonic boom, creating a @Template[type:burst|distance:100] centered on her point of departure. All creatures in the area take @Damage[15d10[sonic]|options:area-damage] damage (@Check[fortitude|dc:46|basic|options:area-effect] save). A creature who fails is also knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}, and a creature who critically fails is knocked prone and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]{Deafened} permanently.

Deadly Striker.name: 致命一击 Deadly Striker
Deadly Striker.description: 只要神话游击使用动作跨步10尺或以上（或钻地、攀爬或飞行 10 英尺或以上），它的下一次攻击就会额外造成1d6精准伤害。

Flying Strafe.name: 飞掠 Flying Strafe
Flying Strafe.description: 狮鹫最多以满速飞行，并在这一行动中的任何时刻进行两次鸟爪打击。每次打击必须针对不同的生物。每次打击正常计算多重攻击减值。

Mythic Power.name: 神话之力 Mythic Power
Mythic Power.description: 该生物拥有 3 点神话点，并可以将这些神话点用于以下任何动作。

Mythic Skill (Acrobatics).name: 神话技能 Mythic Skill (特技)
Mythic Skill (Acrobatics).description:
花费 1神话点

效果 该生物在下一次技能检定时会获得+4加值，并在该检定中被视为拥有神话熟练度。此能力应用于获得此能力时的一项技能，如果生物的等级达到12级或更高，则应用于第二项技能。

Pounce.name: 猛扑 Pounce
Pounce.description: 狮鹫行走，移动结束后衔接一次鸟爪打击。如果狮鹫在开始此行动前处于@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]状态，则它保持藏匿直到该次打击结束。

Unimpeded.name: 畅通无阻 Unimpeded
Unimpeded.description:
花费 1神话点

效果 神话游击会自动结束一个使其速度受到环境惩罚的效果。当它试图@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]一个使它@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]、@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]或@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]的效果时，它会自动成功。

Regal Shriek.name: 威严尖叫 Regal Shriek
Regal Shriek.description:
狮鹫发出一声尖叫，然后变成可怕的咆哮。@Template[emanation|distance:60]范围的每个目标必须尝试@Check[will|dc:20]豁免。无论结果如何，生物在10分钟内对所有狮鹫的威严尖叫临时免疫。

大成功 生物不受影响。

成功 生物@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 1}。

失败 生物@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 2}。动物在惊惧状态中时还会陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1}。

大失败 生物@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 3}。动物在惊惧状态中时还会陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]。

Mythic Griffon.name: 神话狮鹫 Mythic Griffon
Mythic Griffon.publicNotes:
狮鹫被尊崇为自由和力量的象征，也许没有任何动物能像获得神话之力的狮鹫一样自由。神话狮鹫能发动致命的毁灭性攻击，几乎不可能被捕获，没有道德，也不忠于任何党派或国家，对某些人来说，它们是完美的武器。许多德鲁伊和游侠则将它们视为与自己并无二致的融合体，这种自然界的生物被赋予了魔法力量，使其超越了世俗的同类。

神话狮鹫通常具有一些特殊的特征，很容易与非神话狮鹫区分开来。羽毛、喙或爪子上的金属光泽是比较常见的表现。也有文献记载它们周遭有金色或银色的光环，还有一些报道指出神话狮鹫被火焰或电击等魔法能量所笼罩。

由于它们并不比非神话的同类更聪明，所以神话狮鹫作为坐骑很有吸引力。目前还没有人成功捕获过狮鹫，但渴望成为英雄和热衷于探险的人却会铤而走险，并因此丧命。

Lightning's Dance.name: Lightning's Dance
Lightning's Dance.disable: @Check[crafting|dc:35|name:Fashion Makeshift Lightning Rod] (master) to fashion a makeshift lightning rod, @Check[nature|dc:33|name:Dissipate Electrical Charge] (expert) to dissipate the electrical charge harmlessly into the air.
Lightning's Dance.hazarddescription: Electricity suffuses an area where Agyra has used her lightning breath multiple times.
Lightning's Dance.routine: (2 actions) Bolts of lightning flash out. The hazard makes two lightning bolt Strikes at two different creatures within 120 feet of the hazard's center. If only one creature is in range, the hazard makes only one Strike.
Lightning's Dance.reset: The hazard deactivates and immediately resets if has no targets for 1 round; it also resets if Agyra uses her lightning breath multiple times in a single combat in the area.

Static Shock.description:
Trigger A creature approaches within 10 feet of the hazard's center

Effect Electricity wells up from the ground and nearby material. Each creature in the hazard's area must attempt a @Check[fortitude|dc:33] save, and the hazard then rolls initiative. A character wearing metal armor or wielding a metal shield or weapon of at least 1 Bulk treats the result of their saving throw as one step worse.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1} for 1 round.

Failure The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 2} for 2 rounds.

Critical Failure The creature is clumsy 2 for 4 rounds and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 1} for 1 round.
Static Shock.name: Static Shock

Lightning's Dance.stealthdetails: (expert) or @Check[perception|dc:33] (master) to notice sparks dancing around normally non-conductive surfaces

Boneburst.name: Boneburst
Boneburst.routine: (2 actions) An awakened boneburst occupies a @Template[square|distance:20]; it is reduced to a @Template[square|distance:10] when it reaches its BT. It can occupy the same space as other creatures, but not other bonebursts. On its initiative, the boneburst Flies up to 30 feet toward the nearest living creature as its first action. As its second action, the boneburst then coalesces around any living creature within its space, invisible shards of bone tearing at their flesh. Each living creature in its space takes @Damage[(2d10+18)[slashing],1d10[spirit]|options:area-damage]{2d10+18 slashing damage and 1d10 spirit damage} (@Check[reflex|dc:35|basic|options:area-effect] save). If no living creatures are within its space, the boneburst can use its second action to Fly up to 30 feet.
Boneburst.reset: If the boneburst spends 5 consecutive rounds without coalescing around a living creature, it falls dormant, sinking back into the earth. After it falls dormant or is disabled, the boneburst gathers energy over the course of the next hour, after which it can be triggered again.
Boneburst.disable: @Check[occultism|dc:38|name:Negate Psychic Resonances] (master) to temporarily negate the psychic resonances around each fragment, causing the agglomeration to fall apart, or @Check[religion|dc:33|name:Interrupt Unholy Power] (expert) to temporarily interrupt Verex-That-Was's unholy power with divine energy from another source. If a boneburst takes 40 points of damage from a single source and it isn't destroyed, it is rendered dormant for 1 round.
Boneburst.stealthdetails: (master) to notice that clouds of debris are coalescing into swirling, faceless shapes held together by rust-red fog and spectral, dripping clots of gore
Boneburst.hazarddescription: A low howl rises from the ground, gathering strength as scraps of ancient armor, bone fragments, and clumps of earth rise into the air. Crimson vapor holds the faceless shape together, never coalescing into an identifiable form, but merely writhing through ever-changing images of torment and destruction.

Gathering Mist.name: Gathering Mist
Gathering Mist.description:
Trigger A living creature approaches within 50 feet of a dormant boneburst

Effect The boneburst awakens, roiling up from the ground, and rolls initiative.

Wind Surge.name: Wind Surge
Wind Surge.disable: @Check[athletics|dc:27|name:Crouch and Contort] (expert) or @Check[acrobatics|dc:27|name:Crouch and Contort] (expert) to crouch and contort out of the wind's way (disables the hazard for only yourself), @Check[survival|dc:30|name:Point Out a Safe Space] to point out a safe space from the winds for up to 3 creatures.
Wind Surge.hazarddescription: Hurricane-force winds rip through the area as Agyra flies past.
Wind Surge.stealthdetails: (expert) to note stirrings in the wind

Hurricane Flyby.name: Hurricane Flyby
Hurricane Flyby.description:
Trigger Agyra flies overhead for at least 120 feet in a straight line

Effect Supernaturally powerful winds batter the area in a line that is @Template[line|distance:120|width:30]{120 feet long and 30 feet wide and 30 feet tall}. Each creature in the line must attempt a @Check[reflex|dc:29] save. Moving above ground against the direction of the line is greater difficult terrain for 1 minute.

Critical Success The creature is pushed 10 feet along the line.

Success The creature takes @Damage[5d6[bludgeoning]] damage and is pushed 15 along the line.

Failure The creatures takes @Damage[10d6[bludgeoning]] damage, is pushed 30 feet along the line, and is knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}.

Critical Failure The creature takes @Damage[20d6[bludgeoning]] damage, is pushed 45 feet along the line, is knocked prone, and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 1} for 1 round.

If the line overlaps a body of water, the winds cause massive waves that deal @Damage[6d6[bludgeoning]] damage to creatures in the water or within 15 feet of the waterline (@Check[reflex|dc:29|basic] save). On a critical failure, a creature is also swept 30 feet away from the waterline and 15 feet beneath the water's surface.
